Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing the metropolitan transportation authority disabled riders' council
Summary: Establishes the metropolitan transportation riders' council for persons with disabilities; provides for membership and powers and duties.
LawCode: Amd ยง1263, add ยง1266-l, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the board of the metropolitan transportation authority; and in relation to the establishment of the metropolitan transit authority riders' council for persons with disabilities
